snippet: Andy Murray etched his name in history books by winning an unprecedented second singles title at the Rio Games and the Briton now has his sights on the ultimate prize: overhauling Novak Djokovic to become the world no. 1....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray etched his name in history books by winning an unprecedented second singles title at the Rio Games and the Briton now has his sights on the ultimate prize: overhauling Novak Djokovic to become the world no. 1.

headline.print_headline: Murray Dominates in Rio, Outsider Puig Arrives on Big Stage
headline.main: Murray Dominates in Rio, Outsider Puig Arrives on Big Stage
